item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 的销售热潮未能缓解游戏开发者的忧虑情绪
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Takashi Mochizuki 报道了任天堂 Switch 2 游戏机受到消费者热捧，但独立游戏厂商销售低迷的情况。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Takashi Mochizuki reports on the sluggish sales for independent game makers despite consumer enthusiasm for Nintendo’s Switch 2 console.】

item.title: 中国为受特朗普关税冲击的出口产品寻找其他市场
item.description: 在美国开征高额关税的五个月里，习近平主席的出口引擎势不可挡，使中国的贸易顺差超过 1.2 万亿美元，创历史新高。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s export engine has proved unstoppable during five months of sky-high US tariffs, sending China toward a record trade surplus exceeding $1.2 trillion.】

item.title: 风险投资公司致人工智能初创企业：请收下我们的钱
item.description:
私人飞机、包厢座位和大额支票。投资者不惜一切代价进入顶级人工智能交易。【原文：

Private jets, box seats and big checks. Investors are doing whatever it takes to get into top AI deals.

】

item.title: 苹果公司的 iPhone 17 产品线因重新关注硬件而获胜
item.description:
全新的设计、超薄的手机和升级的摄像头让苹果智能技术退居其次。【原文：

Apple Intelligence takes a backseat to fresh designs, a very thin phone and upgraded cameras.

】

item.title: 美国关税收入激增显而易见，官员们对谁来买单意见不一
item.description: 我是洛杉矶的经济编辑劳拉-柯蒂斯。今天我们将探讨美国关税支付膨胀的出处。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Laura Curtis, an economics editor in Los Angeles. Today we’re looking at the provenance of the swelling US tariff payments. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 佩雷拉称欧洲央行应在利率问题上保持 "操作空间
item.description: 即将上任的欧洲中央银行理事会成员阿尔瓦罗-桑托斯-佩雷拉（Alvaro Santos Pereira）表示，欧洲中央银行的通货膨胀已得到控制，未来应在利率方面保持行动空间。【原文：The European Central Bank has inflation is under control and should maintain space to act in the future on interest rates, according to incoming Governing Council member Alvaro Santos Pereira.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦寻求石油以外的经济增长，并依靠中国来实现这一目标
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦主管经济的副总理表示，哈萨克斯坦正在努力摆脱石油依赖，依靠中国并投入数百亿美元支持经济增长。【原文：Kazakhstan is pushing ahead with efforts to wean itself off oil, leaning on China and plowing tens of billions of dollars into supporting growth, according to the deputy premier overseeing the economy.】

item.title: 关注鲍威尔，美债迎来五天来首次上涨
item.description: 由于交易员预计美联储的一系列发言人可能会发出更多降息信号，国债在五个交易日中首次上涨。【原文：Treasuries headed for their first day of gains in five sessions as traders anticipated a slew of Federal Reserve speakers may signal more interest-rate cuts are coming.】

item.title: 肯尼亚首席执行官称，肯尼亚尚未就分拆公司事宜与 Safaricom 董事会接触
item.description: 肯尼亚 Safaricom Plc 首席执行官 Peter Ndegwa 表示，肯尼亚政府尚未与 Safaricom Plc 董事会商讨将其最大公司拆分为三家独立公司的潜在计划。【原文：Kenya’s government is yet to engage the board of Safaricom Plc about a potential plan to split its biggest company into three separate firms, according to Chief Executive Officer Peter Ndegwa.】

item.title: 英国央行皮尔称其拥有更快削减量化宽松债券的工具
item.description: 英格兰银行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，央行应更快地缩减其在量化宽松政策下建立起来的债券资产负债表，因为如果市场出现紧张，央行拥有支撑市场的工具。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said the central bank should run down its balance sheet of bonds built up under quantitative easing more quickly because it has tools to shore up markets if strains emerged.】

item.title: 亲俄的斯洛伐克对被排除在欧盟 "无人机墙 "之外表示遗憾
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）不顾欧盟的一致意见，坚持与莫斯科保持联系，他的一位盟友对欧盟计划在其东翼建造不包括斯洛伐克或匈牙利在内的 "无人机墙 "进行了抨击。【原文：An ally of Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico, who has defied European Union consensus by maintaining ties with Moscow, lashed out at EU plans for a “drone wall” on its eastern flank that doesn’t include Slovakia or Hungary.】

item.title: 沃伦就阿根廷 "救市 "问题质询贝森特，米莱伊翘首以待
item.description: 马萨诸塞州参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）致信财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），希望获得更多有关特朗普政府可能 "救助 "阿根廷经济的信息。【原文：Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts wrote to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent seeking more information about the Trump administration’s potential “bailout” of Argentina’s economy.】

item.title: 肯尼亚耗资 11.5 亿美元的管道 IPO 比 17 年前 Safaricom 的规模还要大
item.description: 肯尼亚计划通过出售其石油管道公司的股票筹集多达 11.5 亿美元的资金，这可能是该国最大的首次公开募股，也是十年来的首次。【原文：Kenya plans to raise as much as $1.15 billion by selling shares in its petroleum pipeline company, potentially the nation’s biggest initial public offering and its first in a decade.】

item.title: 股票牛市让策略师们苦苦追赶
item.description:
华尔街对 S&P 500 指数的年终平均预测低于当前水平。【原文：

Wall Street’s average year-end forecast for the S&P 500 is below current levels.

】

item.title: 新兴市场货币下滑，印度卢比创历史新低
item.description: 在包括美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在内的美联储政策制定者发表讲话之前，美元汇率盘整，新兴市场货币指数连续第四天下滑。【原文：A gauge of emerging-market currencies slipped for a fourth day as the dollar consolidated ahead of speeches by Federal Reserve policy makers including Chair Jerome Powell which may give investors more clarity on the central bank’s policy path.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师追捧 S&P 500 指数，史无前例
item.description: 自市场从年初的下滑中反弹以来，卖方策略师就急于上调股票目标，但他们一直低估了反弹的力度。【原文：Sell-side strategists, who have rushed to upgrade their stock targets ever since the market rebounded from its early-year slide, keep underestimating the rally’s strength.】

item.title: 台湾以国家安全为由限制向南非出口芯片
item.description: 台湾以国家安全为由，要求对运往南非的芯片进行预先审批。【原文：Taiwan is requiring pre-approval for chips going to South Africa, citing national security concerns.】

item.title: 英国 30 年期债券销售获得 2022 年以来最少订单
item.description: 在英国发行的 30 年期债券中，订单总量创下了自 2022 年以来的新低，这凸显了对长期金边债券需求的减弱。【原文：A UK offering of 30-year debt saw the lowest total orders since 2022, highlighting waning demand for long-term gilts.】

item.title: 丹麦根据欧盟绿色规则出售首笔主权债券
item.description: 丹麦将成为第一个根据欧盟新标准发行绿色债券的国家，这标志着该集团在遏制 "洗绿 "行为方面取得了里程碑式的进展。【原文：Denmark is set to become the first country to issue a green bond under the European Union’s new standards, marking a milestone in the bloc’s push to curb greenwashing.】

item.title: 经合组织称世界经济尚未完全感受到特朗普关税的影响
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）表示，尽管最近几个月全球经济表现出比预期更强的韧性，但全球经济仍将受到唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）贸易措施的实质性打击。【原文：The global economy is still on course for a substantial blow from Donald Trump’s trade measures despite showing greater resilience than expected in recent months, the OECD said.】

item.title: 防务初创企业 Auterion 融资 1.3 亿美元，欲成为无人机领域的微软
item.description: Auterion 是一家为军用无人机提供软件的初创公司，该公司已融资 1.3 亿美元，用于扩大海外业务，包括在地缘政治热点地区乌克兰和台湾的业务，这进一步表明私人投资者正在将资金投入国防领域。【原文：Auterion, a startup that provides software to military drones, has raised $130 million to expand its operations abroad, including in geopolitical hotspots Ukraine and Taiwan, a further sign that private investors are pouring money into defense.】

item.title: 经合组织称英国今年将成为七国集团第二大经济体
item.description: 根据经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）的数据，英国今年将成为七国集团中增长最快的经济体，仅次于美国，但仍在努力解决通货膨胀问题。【原文：Britain will be the fastest-growing Group of Seven economy bar the US this year, while still struggling to get a handle on its inflation problem, according to the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development.】

item.title: 马拉松公司的理查兹认为 LBO 和私人信贷即将迎来大丰收
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司（Marathon Asset Management LP）主席布鲁斯-理查兹（Bruce Richards）认为，下一任美联储主席上任后，并购和私人市场将出现反弹。【原文：Mergers and acquisitions and private markets will rebound when the next Federal Reserve chair is appointed, according to Marathon Asset Management LP Chairman Bruce Richards.】

item.title: 抽水蓄能停滞不前，澳大利亚政府达成电池承购协议
item.description: 澳大利亚斯诺水电有限公司（Snowy Hydro Ltd.）达成协议，将使用 Blackrock Inc. 旗下公司开发的电池，以应对该国电力市场的剧烈波动，因为该国正在转向使用间歇性更强的可再生能源。【原文：Australia’s Snowy Hydro Ltd. struck a deal to use a battery being developed by a Blackrock Inc. unit in a bid to manage the country’s rampant power market volatility as it shifts to more intermittent renewable sources.】

item.title: 澳门博彩公司澳博计划首次发行点心债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由已故赌场大亨何鸿燊创立的澳博控股有限公司（SJM Holdings Ltd.）正准备进行四年来的首次公开发债，出售离岸人民币债券。【原文：SJM Holdings Ltd., founded by the late casino magnate Stanley Ho, is preparing its first public debt offering in four years with an offshore yuan-denominated bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 开始 11 亿美元印度首次公开募股路演
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度第二大资产管理公司 ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co.【原文：ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co., India’s second-largest asset manager, has begun investor roadshows ahead of its planned initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 天气转凉，中国 8 月用电量增速放缓
item.description: 国家能源局公布的数据显示，由于酷暑终于有所缓解，中国 8 月份的电力需求增长放缓。【原文：China’s power demand growth slowed in August as scorching summer heat finally eased, according to data released by the National Energy Administration.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数显示英国出口订单以五个月来最快速度下降
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，自 4 月份美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布征收全球关税以来，英国出口需求以最快速度下降。【原文：Demand for British exports declined at the fastest pace since April when US President Donald Trump announced his global tariffs, according to a closely watched survey.】

item.title: 需求强劲，瑞银售出 12.5 亿澳元 AT1 债券
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）通过以澳元计价的股权转换附加一级债券筹集了 12.5 亿澳元（8.24 亿美元），满足了现金充裕的投资者对这种高风险债务形式的强劲需求。【原文：UBS Group AG raised A$1.25 billion ($824 million) via an Australian-dollar denominated equity-conversion Additional Tier 1 bond, tapping strong demand from cash-flush investors for this risky form of debt.】

item.title: 中国寻求外国黄金储备以提升全球影响力
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国的目标是成为外国主权黄金储备的托管国，以加强其在全球金银市场的地位。【原文：China aims to become custodian of foreign sovereign gold reserves in a bid to strengthen its standing in the global bullion market, according to people familiar with the matter.】
